channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
channel.desc: Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals! Call 0800 090 3393 or visit us at www.loveitbookit.com/tv.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Cheltenham to convert Brandon's bland, sparse garden into a contemporary, exotic haven, inspired by his travels to the jungles of Asia and South America.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee head to Southampton to conjure Michelle's garden up into a tropical paradise - the perfect space to relax with friends and family - all for ?6,000.

channel.title: Wartime Farm
channel.desc: Reclaiming unused land for farming is the first role on the 'frontline of freedom'. 1/8.

channel.title: Wartime Farm
channel.desc: The team tackle the conditions faced in 1940, in the face of rationing and the Blitz. 2/8.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Right To Roam
channel.desc: The story of the people who have struggled for the right to roam in England - from the mass trespass on Kinder Scout in 1932 to the great Dartmoor Gathering of 2023.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Hussy
channel.desc: Helen Mirren stars as a sex worker who begins an affair with a shady colleague at their high-class London cabaret. Can their relationship survive? Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Groupie Girl
channel.desc: Sally runs away from her strict upbringing to become a rock band's groupie. A cautionary tale of hairy hippies and heartbreak. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: A detective film set in seventies London's seedy porn trade. A serial killer is targeting women who all appeared in the magazine Playbirds. Contains adult scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: In The Spotlight
channel.desc: Exploring the working lives of musicians working in London's West End from 1950s Soho, jazz clubs and theatre up to the present day.

channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Coventry to design a versatile family garden for Jo, James, Jess and Finlay with a sporting twist for future Paralympian Jess.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Chris and Lee are in Wilmslow to transform Adam and Lauren's tired, boring garden into a Chinese-inspired space with a woodland vibe.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Hello Campers
channel.desc: Relive the glory days of good clean Hi-De-Hi style fun with this oral history of Britain's holiday camps. Hello Campers.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Black Beauty
channel.desc: Faithful version of classic children's tale featuring the adventures of spirited horse Black Beauty. Can her young owner get her back? Mark Lester - of Oliver! fame - stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Futtock's End
channel.desc: Ronnie Barker stars as General Futtock, who has a motley group of guests stay at his country estate - and chaos ensues. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: What's Good For The Goose
channel.desc: Comedy. Norman Wisdom stars as a bank manager who upends his square existence to join some youthful hippies. Will this new groovy energy bring the spark back to his marriage.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Magnificent Seven Deadly Sins
channel.desc: Bawdy seventies sketch comedy film starring a bevy of British talent from Bruce Forsyth and Harry Secombe to Joan Simms and June Whitfield. Contains 70s social attitudes.
